reviewText: Use it in class - students are fascinated!

Great documentary- updated from a previous PBS documentary. My students really enjoyed and related to this particular documentary- some tough subjects included so ensure you preview the film- but definitely worth viewing.
This is an OUTSTANDING DVD! It is well-made,expertly researched, fast, pacey, factual and highly relevant to 2014 teen culture. It's an eye-opener to parents and kids alike.
